name: Planet Shooter
description:
Planet shooter is a 2D versus multiplayer party game (2 - 6 players), based on the "bubble shooter" genre, where you play as cute Tiny Old Ones at war. 

Throw colorful planets at your opponent's side to get them into trouble but do not  forget to clear your own side in the mean time, otherwise you will quickly get submerged. 
You and your opponents are located all around a central vortex to wich planets you throw may stick. Match three or more planets of the same color to make them explode and free up some place around you. 
Try to survive as long as you can and be the last one alive to win the round !

Controls :

  • Right stick to pull the slingshot
